import React from 'react' import '../Pages/styles.css' import '../App.css' const Service =(props) => { function handleClick(e) { e.preventDefault() if (e.target.value === "Water tank fill") { props.setService('Water tank fill') } if (e.target.value === "Water tank cleaning") { props.setService('Water tank fill') } props.setFormStep(1) } return ( <>

Choose a service

{/* */}

We deliver water from our tankers to your home water tank ensuring you have drinking water, pool water and spa water all year round.

We get inside your water tank to remove all contaminated water, scrub the walls and suck up and remove any sludge, sediment or dead animals.

) } export default Service
